page.title: 19LAW AND ORDER
page.content: Trelawnyd no longer has a resident Police Constable.The Village will be covered by an officer from either Dyserth or Meliden.Tasks are assigned by the Sergeant at Prestatyn and very little time is allocated to the village.There were less than 10 incidents here last year,his main duties being to follow up enquiries about poaching,straying animals and people seen carrying shotguns for poaching purposes.The heigh nabouring village of trelwgan,which the trelawnyd Policeman used to cover has a far greater number of crimes per year.
